comments.body:
```suggestion
  home: https://github.com/conda-forge/console_shortcut-feedstock
  summary: Command prompt shortcut for Windows with base environment activated
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
```

for the license add https://github.com/AnacondaRecipes/aggregate/blob/master/LICENSE.txt to `recipe/console_shortcut/LICENSE.txt`
